item.title: Open Source Weed Science
item.description: The advance of statistical software can make more comfortable for weed science practitioners (professor, technician, and student) to handle research data using programming languages. The idea of the Open Source Weed Science project is to have a repository in GitHub or create a website (working on that idea) with the typical data analysis of weed research. I first heard about Open Source Weed Science project as a graduate student in Nebraska.
